AD_DuergarPoisoned.synopsis: A deep gnome watches his two slavers die after drinking poisoned beer (although, he didn't know that the beer was poisoned when he brought it to them).
AD_DuergarPoisoned.how_to_trigger: Click onStained Cask - S_UND_ElevatorGnome_BeerBarrel 3c1836b4-2bae-4f2d-9903-4b609639cf57 - (-615; 0; 391)and combine it with any poisonthen go up and talk to Stickpit. Wait for him to go to the Stained Cask and use it. Then he'll go back and give the poisoned booze to the two duergar. They will drink it and die.Stickpit will say this AD

AD_AtWine.synopsis: Repeating AD the gnome plays while getting wine for the Duergar.

AD_DuergarPoisoned_1.speaker: Skickpit
AD_DuergarPoisoned_1.context: NodeContext: SHNICK-tick. The name of a deep gnome king, used her a bit profanely.

AD_AtWine_0.speaker: Skickpit
AD_AtWine_0.text: I slave while they guzzle. No damned justice in that.

AD_AtWine_1.speaker: Skickpit
AD_AtWine_1.text: 'Stickshit this, Stickshit that'. It's 'Skickpit', you goons.

AD_AtWine_2.speaker: Skickpit
AD_AtWine_2.text: Drugnin' prick-holes. I should piss in their drinks.

AD_AtWine_3.speaker: Skickpit
AD_AtWine_3.text: Shit - sooner slave down here then get thrown to the top-land. Drugnin' death-curse.
